summary: REQ-9 and REQ-10 appear implemented via new BengaliShayari and RevealTeddy components wired into the reveal screen. REQ-11’s “page open” burst behavior is implemented in RosePetals, but the burst interval timer is not clearly cleaned up on unmount, which may violate the no-runaway-intervals acceptance criterion.

missing_requirements.requirement: No performance issues or runaway intervals/animation frames occur after repeated page refreshes (proper cleanup of timers/animation).
missing_requirements.reason: The new burstInterval created with setInterval is a local const and is cleared only after the 2-second timeout; the cleanup function does not clear burstInterval if the component unmounts before the timeout fires, which can leave an active interval running.
